致我的朋友、家人、酷儿同胞与同志们：
想象之乐，其妙何极！当此沉醉之时，举世皆为我辈所有——万物莫敢不从，吾等既摧折天地，复以新造之物重缀人间，转瞬却又将它们献祭。诸般罪愆手段尽在掌中，非但尽数施展，更将骇人景象倍增百重。

亲爱的读者，愿您享受本作的荒诞美学，在这动荡年代，且让罪恶深渊温暖您的心灵。
 但当您回归现实时，请记得以最大的善意与尊严对待身边之人。 去热爱每一种生命的辉煌形态——无论外形、体态、种族、性取向或性别认同。 
祈愿未来充满安全、多样与慈悲。

Greetings Patreons! 
Here we are at last, the pregnancy update. 
There is a lot to cover, most of it technical, so I will dive right into it. 

Pregnancy systems are in, including the art for the player belly, and various species of offspring. 
I have written both a bunch of generic, and specific pregnancy scenes, but there is always more to be added. 
Alas, that will have to wait until some future patch. 

NPCs will *not* have updated portraits depending on the pregnancy state. 
Doing so is technically possible, but the amount of artwork required is far out of the scope of a single update. 
Perhaps I will trickle some in over future updates, if I can find the time. 

The genitals system has also gotten an upgrade. 
You can now see what kind of junk you have in the menu, and they are able to add to your stats like equipment. 
I also added a host of potions that can give you special types of genitals, which I will use for some fun shenanigans in a later update, but we will get to that when we get to that. 

The main plot line has been expanded slightly, adding a bunch of content with Bazel the Bee, and expanding the South Palewood map area. 
The update also adds a heap of passives, an enchantment system, line attacks, buff potions, and many small quality of life tweaks, but if I start discussing each one, we will be here all day. 

Back to work for me, the next update is not gonna be small either, I can already tell.

And as per usual, special thanks to my Naughty Weredog tier patrons~: <c(hot_pink)>aarlin</c>, <c(hot_pink)>FadeSeeker</c>, and <c(hot_pink)>Jeremiah Mccollum</c>.

With love,

Alright, here we are again! 
It has been a while, as I had promised an update to Rogschard, which ended up taking a month or two before I could get back to Lordling. 
But here we are, I bring you a content packed update, starting with a new dungeon, the Order of Purity church! 

The Order of Purity church is located in Darkhill, towards the north-east. 
In this place you will be able to advance Genevave's Royal Ghost quest, and farm for ingredients for the bone armor. 
Besides that, it contains new Purity Mook enemies (along with some undead). 
As they are humanoids, they got dedicated win and submission sex scenes, and some dialogue besides.
There is also a lot of story and incidental dialogue, and a strange encounter to close out the dungeon, so plenty to do. 

The townsfolk of Darkhill have been given some love too. 
Sparktail the Innkeep has a new repeatable quest for you (and a Patreon exclusive sex scene to go along with it). 
Garter the Lamia has a substantial heap of new dialogue, for those willing to be her submissive pet, together with a sex scene.
Some new skills have been added too, together with a bunch of general engine work. 
I hope you like it.

Love,
Nrnachs

And as per usual, special thanks to my Naughty Weredog tier patrons~: <c(hot_pink)>aarlin</c>, <c(hot_pink)>FadeSeeker</c>, and <c(hot_pink)>Jeremiah Mccollum</c>.

With love,
Nranchs

Greetings everyone, this month I have quite the heap of additions for you. 
Namly, I bring you angels and snakes!

Alright, with a slight delay, I managed to get v0.4.0 done! 
This update introduces a wide host of quality of life features, together with a new heap of content. 
Firstly, a hotbar has been added, where you can bind skills, items, and actions. 
This will allow you to do most interactions without entering the menus. 
I also made it so that you can hold the movement button down so that you can move more then one tile easily. 
Also, I added a generic interact button (bound to E on desktop), which you can use to do a variety of actions like picking up items, talking to NPCs, and opening doors. 

As for the content, this updates introduces a bunch of temporary buff skills, together with the system to support afflictions and conditions. 
Some new consumables have also been added, together with tweaks to the loot tables of various mobs. 
Lastly, I added a new mini-dungeon south of Darkhill, along with a story quest for Mork. 
I hope you will like it~!

And as per usual, special thanks to my Naughty Weredog tier patrons~: <c(hot_pink)>aarlin</c>, <c(hot_pink)>FadeSeeker</c>, and <c(hot_pink)>Jeremiah Mccollum</c>.

With love,
Nranchs

Finally, after two months of hard work, version 3 is finished! 
I have already been keeping you from playing this build for too long, so let me keep it short.
This update adds a bunch of fundamental features, like leveling up, skill trees, crafting, and choosing what genital you use in sex scenes. 
Also, the first part of the pregnancy and virginity systems has been added, which will display messages when a potential pregnancy or loss of virginity occurs. 
You can't get preggers quite yet, but the events that trigger it are in, meaning I won't have to go back and fix the sex-scenes once it does get added. 

Mobs now respawn after sleeping in a bed, and healing items have been limited for balance reasons. 
The -Sparktail's Spooky Shed- quest has been added, continuing the main quest-line, and there is also an optional quest where you hunt some leafbugs. 
Lastly, a new NPC has been introduced, who runs the daycare next to the Lightn Inn. 
She will take care of your offspring (once you are able to have any, in a future update).

Good morning everyone, it has been a scant three weeks since the first release, but it is already time for Lordling of Heart's second update~ 
The first part of this update will focus on a set of low-level systems improvements. 
Things like the game scaling better on larger monitors, sharing some settings between saves, and adding some additional options to change the screen layout manually. 
This kind of stuff takes a large chunk of the development time, and isn't very flashy, but it is crucial to making sure the game works on as many devices as possible. 

On the features side, a new side panel has been added, displaying information on the map location and the currently tracked quest. 
This also adds quest markers, so you can still find your way when the world gets big (which sounds trivial, but is a feature which I have been working on for months). 
The patreon build will come with a cheatcode panel accessible through the menu, and I spend a bit of time writing a tool for compiling various builds of the game at once (I am now up to 15 of them, and it was getting silly making them by hand).

The rest of the time has been spend on pure content generation. 
Various new NPCs have been added, with accompanying map sprites and portraits. 
The map now extends to the town of Darkhill and the Lightn Inn, were you can find a bunch of dialogue and a new animated sex-scene.
When dying, you will now be kicked into purgatory first, before directly re-spawning. 

That will be it for this patch. 
Next update will focus on combat, adding in more of the core feature set. 
Look forward to that!

And as per usual, special thanks to my Naughty Weredog tier patrons~: <c(hot_pink)>aarlin</c>, <c(hot_pink)>FadeSeeker</c>, and <c(hot_pink)>Jeremiah Mccollum</c>.

With love,
Nranchs

Alright, here it finally is, the first prototype of the new project! 
The name of the game is <loh(Lordling of Hearts)>.
I am not certain if this name will stick around for the first release, but it is good enough for now. 

The big plan for this game is to make a text-RPG like <rog(Rogschard)>, but with more modern polish. 
With <loh(Lordling of Hearts)>, I am hoping to add a lot of the requested features that were impossible to add to <rog(Rogschard)> due to the engine limitations and technical debt, while trimming some of the unneeded fat. 
There will be a lot more art/portraits in this game, almost all of them animated. 
Npc's will have expressions and nude sprites, and pregnancy will be displayed on the player portrait (once it is in). 
I will also add more options for player responses, to allow for more interactivity in the dialogue. 
The map in <loh(Lordling of Hearts)> is fully rendered, and a lot of the combat info will be displayed on there. 
This means there will be a lot less halting of the flow of the gameplay with text popups.

Other fancy features are still being worked on in the background.
I will tell you about them once they are closer to completion. 

On a small unfortunate note, dedicated IOS builds didn't work out, and there is currently a problem with Godot 4 web builds on Mac/IOS. 
I made a dedicated MacOs build, but I am afraid IOS support will be lacking for the foreseeable future. 
The issue with the Godot engine web builds will likely be resolved someday(tm), but there is no known timeline at the moment. 
I have heard word that the IOS web builds might work on a Firefox browser, so you can try that if you can't wait.

And as per usual, special thanks to my Naughty Weredog tier patrons~: <c(hot_pink)>aarlin</c>, <c(hot_pink)>FadeSeeker</c>, and <c(hot_pink)>Jeremiah Mccollum</c>.

愛麗絲帶著她一貫的虛假笑容面對你，手指在桌子上的一處空位敲了敲。很明顯，她希望那份賄賂能早點到手，然後在有人發現任何異常之前把你打發回人世間。
所以，那個「來世PLUS」是什麼東西？
所以，關於那份賄賂。要多少？
我身上一個盾幣都沒有
提議和她一起喝白蘭地
你以為自己已經死了，但出乎意料的是，你在一個陌生的地方醒來。刺眼的螢光燈照亮了油氈地板，世界上最單調的現代藝術畫作點綴在原本毫無特色的白牆上，遠處還能聽到空調的嗡嗡聲。你無比驚恐地意識到，你醒在了最糟糕的那種煉獄裡——一個現代辦公室。

當你走近這個奇怪辦公室的遠端時，一張桌子擋住了你的去路。桌子後面，一位女士坐在辦公椅上，面對著一台明顯是2000年代初期的電腦。她穿著一套曾經一塵不染的職業裝。不幸的是，這套西裝似乎經歷了太多次洗滌，邊緣已經褪色了。從這位女士的背後伸展出巨大的白色翅膀，即使在刺眼的螢光燈下也似乎閃閃發光，一個光環懸浮在她的頭頂。當你走到她面前時，她似乎沒有注意到你。她空洞的目光固定在中等距離的某處，臉上似乎凝固著一種顯然是裝出來的職業微笑。

<choose(speech,alice_first_talk_0,hello|<speaker(player)>"你好？" You asked.)>
<choose(speech,alice_first_talk_0,what|<speaker(player)>"這是哪裡？" You asked.)>
<choose(speech,alice_first_talk_0,who|<speaker(player)>"你是誰？" You asked.)>

聽到你的話，天使突然驚叫一聲，困惑地環顧四周。

<speaker(alice)>「誰——什——我、我沒在睡覺，老闆，我發誓——」她驚慌地脫口而出，然後才意識到這裡只有你一個人。
「等等……你是誰？」

天使的臉頰上泛起一絲淡淡的紅暈，她坐回椅子上，清了清喉嚨。

<speaker(alice)>「呃——抱歉，親愛的客戶。」她繼續說道，語氣突然變得像二手車銷售員一樣流暢。
「我剛才——正在與更高權力進行心靈溝通，暫時未能感知您的到來。
但是，別擔心，我現在洗耳恭聽了。
歡迎，親愛的靈魂，來到來世PLUS！」

她以一個耀眼卻極度虛假的微笑結束了她的發言。

當你除了略帶困惑地挑起眉毛之外沒有任何反應時，天使臉上的笑容抽搐了一瞬間，然後又恢復了原樣。
